name: NAVARRO (Pre-Alpha)
description:
You are Lunette. You are being sent down deep into the overrun underground facility as a part of OPERATION: Pest Control.

Kill as many of those 'things' as you can.

Art by : KuroHATO

Developed as a part of 2020 GRDC Final Project. This game was created within 1.5 months, and was intended to be a learning experience for the team. Therefore, the game is very unfinished, and the development has been on hold indefinitely.

Controls

A - Move to the left / D - Move to the right

W - Jump

G - Roll (gives you i-frame and can get you through enemies)

Left Mouse - Melee attack

Right Mouse - Shoot
developers: Game Research And Development Club - CU
